dict.string: Staff blcok system is a railroad communications system that the train is required to hold a symbol to run a block.
Railway signalling is a system used to direct railway traffic and keep trains clear of each other at all times.
Signalling blcok system is a railroad communications system that consists of a series of signals that divide a railway line into a series of sections, or "blocks".

Authority to occupy a block is conveyed to trains by the use of wayside signals manually controlled by human operators following various procedures to communicate with other block stations to ensure separation of trains.
Automatic block signaling uses a series of automated signals, normally lights or flags, that change their display, or aspect, based on the movement of trains past a sensor.
